name: War of the Worlds: Inside the City
name_original: War of the Worlds: Inside the City
description:
Extraterrestrials got enter the city. Now you must movilize your soldiers to try stopping the invasion. Send poor soldiers throug portal so they can defeat evil extraterrestials. Good Luck, soldier!

If played on PC enabling fullscreen is recommended. Play on smartphone for best experience.

Not try playing at 2K or above, not HD.
